name: dast-cypress-zap
description: A Proof of concept demonstrating CI-level DAST using Cypress web automation and OWASP ZAP

scripts.zap-local:start: npm run clean && zap.sh -daemon -port 8080 -host 0.0.0.0 -config api.addrs.addr.regex=true -config api.disablekey=true -newsession $INIT_CWD/zap-results/session
scripts.zap-local:start-bg: npm run clean && zap.sh -daemon -port 8080 -host 0.0.0.0 -config api.addrs.addr.regex=true -config api.disablekey=true -newsession $INIT_CWD/zap-results/session &
scripts.zap-docker:start: npm run clean && docker run -p 8080:8080 -d  --network=host -i owasp/zap2docker-stable zap.sh -daemon -port 8080 -host 0.0.0.0 -config api.addrs.addr.regex=true -config api.disablekey=true
scripts.dast:all: npm run zap-local:start-bg && npm run cypress:tests-ci && npm run remote:zap-active-scan:zap:scan-reports && npm run zap-local:shutdown
scripts.dast-docker:all: npm run zap-docker:start && npm run cypress:tests-ci && npm run remote:zap-active-scan:zap:scan-reports && npm run zap-docker:shutdown

author: John Sotiropoulos
